statements: UPDATE device_settings SET firmware_version = 'v1.2.3.4' WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
UPDATE device_settings SET last_update = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE device_name = 'TestDevice'
UPDATE device_settings SET firmware_version='v2.0', last_update='2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE device_settings SET location_info='{"latitude": 34.0522, "longitude": -118.2437}', device_name='Smart Device 2' WHERE device_id='87654321-89b0-4da7-9d8c-cd7654321fe9';
UPDATE DeviceConfigSettings SET param_value='new_value' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE DeviceUpdates SET update_description='Updated description', updated_at='2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE device_id=2;
UPDATE DeviceConfigSettings SET param_value='new_value' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE DeviceUpdates SET update_description='Updated software' WHERE device_id=1 AND update_version='v1.2';
UPDATE configuration_settings SET setting_value = 'new_value' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE device_parameters SET parameter_value = 'updated_value' WHERE parameter_id = 3;
UPDATE configuration_settings SET setting_value='new_value' WHERE device_id=101 AND setting_name='brightness';
UPDATE device_parameters SET parameter_value='updated_value', parameter_type='boolean' WHERE device_id=201 AND parameter_name='is_active';
UPDATE DeviceSettings SET firmware_version = 'v2.0.1' WHERE device_id = 12345;
UPDATE DeviceLogs SET log_description = 'Log updated' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE DeviceSettings SET firmware_version = 'v2.0.1', configuration_settings = '{"setting1": "value1", "setting2": "value2"}' WHERE device_id = 101
UPDATE DeviceLogs SET log_timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00', log_description = 'System error occurred, please check' WHERE log_id = 201
UPDATE Device SET device_name = 'New Device Name', manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Configuration SET config_name = 'New Config Name', config_value = 'New Config Value' WHERE device_id = 2;
